## Public Member Functions

### shouldOmitSectionDirective() {#a61fc81fb9125f5e5c7184ea3609c4a46}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::NVPTXMCAsmInfo::shouldOmitSectionDirective (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SectionName) const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Return true if the .section directive should be omitted when emitting <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname">SectionName</a></code>.

For example:

shouldOmitSectionDirective(&quot;.text&quot;)

returns false =&gt; .section .text,#alloc,#execinstr returns true =&gt; .text

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/lib/target/nvptx/mctargetdesc/nvptxmcasminfo-h/#l00035">35</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/lib/target/nvptx/mctargetdesc/nvptxmcasminfo-h">NVPTXMCAsmInfo.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
